name: TjL
description: Developer of [Vixxi.me](https://vixxi.me) a digitial content marketplace for Nano; [nPass](https://npass.dev), a browser extension wallet and access token system built on Nano; and  [Nanobomb](https://npass.dev/npass/nanobomb) a Nano based web game using nPass tokens. Known as [u/t_j_l_](https://www.reddit.com/u/t_j_l_) on reddit.
